overview: Tick-tock. Since the invention of the mechanical clock and the advent of capitalism, mankind has been accelerating its pace of life.  Without realising it, this century has created a definition of time that no one in the past or present could understand or imagine. Time has become ‘that which is missing’. How did this happen? Spend 52 minutes exploring the changing perception of time in our society and the surprising consequences that have resulted.
title: Dealing with time
